title.rendered: Large LED Open Sign Neon Bright for Restaurant Pub Bar Club Shop Store Business

content.rendered:
• 【 USA INVENTORY IN STOCK 】 Ship within 1 business day handling time, buy with full confidence
  •  【 Jumbo Extra Large Size 】True size of 32 x 16 x 1.5 inches jumbo size extra large rectangle super bright OPEN sign. It easily fits between window and blinds
  •  【 Saves 80% Energy 】Signs are much brighter and much more visible than the Neon sign with much lower energy consumption rate 
  •  【 Five-speed Flash and Scroll 】This Open sign offers “Static” , “Five-speed Flash and Scroll” to attract customer’s attention. Switch between two different functions, static or blinking, delivering the eye-catching intensity to power through dark tinted windows
  •  【 Get Your Business Seen Day or Night 】Delivering the eyes-catching intensity through windows. Energy-efficient SMD LEDs with high visibility even during the daytime
  •  【 Professional Grade 】LED Open Sign with full function remote control. 100.000 Hours of Operation
  •  【 Much Brighter than Neon 】Ultra bright, striking RED and BLUE SMD LEDs
  •  【 Last Longer 】This LED OPEN sign built with HDPE plastic and high quality components. Simple and attractive design enhances the outlook of your business
  •  【 Fast installation 】Hanging hardware included: chains & fixing hooks. Also includes AC/DC 6 feet corded adapter
  •  【 Versatile 】Suitable as Office Open Signs, Restaurant Open Signs, Deli Open Signs, Super-Market Open Signs, Auto Shop Open Signs, Barbershop Open Signs, Bar Pub Open Signs and much more
  •  【 Gran cartel abierto LED Brillante 】 Gran letrero luminoso LED abierto letrero de neón de bienvenida para restaurante bar con animación intermitente de control remoto

excerpt.rendered:
• Get Your Business Seen Day and Night
  • Extra Large Ultra Bright LED Open Sign, Jumbo LED Business Open Sign with Remote Control
  • This is Neon Glass Open Sign Alternative Super Bright LED Open Sign with up to 80% saving of energy 
  • Jumbo Size ( True Size of 32 x 16 x 1.5 inches ) FLASHING LED Open Sign for Daytime and Night for Florist Shop, Restaurants, Bakery, Diner, Grill, Pub, Bars, Café Coffee Shop, Office, Store, Retail Shops, Hotel, Motel, Spa, Barbershop, Car Repair Shop, Gas Station.
